message.body: I still don't see how that makes me a terrible person.
I'm pretty sure this applies:
Andres: it's still your fault though 11:44 AM me: You brought this all on your self! Andres: I've already decided
Just reverse the parties.
I can't help it if I am good at making decisions
Ha. I'll hold you to that. ;)
so I guess we are still on for tomorrow night then?
As long as your hatred is under control. =P
hey, you're the one telling me I am a terrible person. I only say nice things =)
Apparently you're a liar as well.
see...there you go again
Well hello there Liz! How is your day going?
Feels a little off for some reason.
And good morning
Andres: I hate you >.< ^ not nice
Andres: some editor you are :-/ ^ not nice
Therefore, you lie.
Good morning (6 minutes before it is no longer morning), and how are you today?
I am well, thank you. Went to bed at 1:30am. A slight improvement
I think I went shortly after 12
I'm hoping for that tonight
What kept you up so late last night since I wasn't around to scapegoat your delay?
my wife
So about that movie.....
O.o
lol
does the fact that I am married present some sort of problem for you?
Alas, slightly. I'm afraid you'll need to supply a permission slip before any future outings so I know she condones your behavior. =P
actually, I got home from work slightly before 10pm. Then I hung out with my roommate until about 1am
Wow, what kept you so late at work?
And I definitely apologize for distracting you if my presence/interference contributed to the delay.
well I was busy, but around 7pm I had some leftover pizza and a beer, and hung out with my cousins wife
Would that make her your cousin-in-law? =/
I guess
So you weren't really working, you were just "at" work?
yuhuh
I've got to get some work done now tho, back in a jiffy
do me a favor and block me real quick. Then unblock me in like a minute, of course
O.o
I'll unblock you at 1. ^_^
welcome back
I must go in seach of lunchfoods
I just ate mine
They were delicious.
ahh...all set
What has you?
a slice o' pizza, pepperoni, pepperjack cheese cubes, tiny little tomatoes, pita chips and a piece of beef jerky...and almonds!
What the hell.
Oh, wait. I thought all of those were on the pizza.
Please tell me all of those aren't on the pizza.
in addition to
Whew
That's quite the collection
a nice little spread. Hopefully enough to satisfy me for the next 3 hrs
http://lifestyle.msn.com/relationships/article.aspx?cp-documentid=18187588&GT1=32023
I'm pretty good at controlling my expectations regarding mind-reading
My downfalls from chick flicks are usually pertaining to wishing that the actions were reflected more in the real world
E.g., actually indicating/expressing excitement/desire/love/whatever
"limited-edition copy of her favorite childhood book (which he recalls from a casual mention when they first started dating years ago)"
I just recently saw this movie, but I'm having a hard time placing what it was
OH
Definitely, Maybe
perhaps you're just dating the wrong guys
That seems obvious at this point.
I dont think the copy of your fav childhood book is all that exceptional
in terms of it being possible
Well, in that movie it was a signed first edition, I think.
wait
Or it was just inscribed by the girl's father
I forget how she lost it to begin with
sure, that part might be a little fantastic, but thats not the point
Yeah, there was a sentimental value. She had like 40 copies of this one book because she'd been hunting "the one" for so long
OH, or maybe it was Serendipity.
RIGHT
That's probably what it was
but he had written his p# in the book
I recall not being that impressed with that movie.
http://lifestyle.msn.com/relationships/staticslideshowcosmo.aspx?cp-documentid=25007360
I need your opinion on the accuracy of this.
Because I think it's full of shit.
k, give me a min
it's not completely bs
Really? O.o
yeah, I kinda agree with the first two
not so much the last two
Guys are weird.
accept its not really an OK signal, but a more natural, relaxed hand
women have their own little weird signals
I'm not sure I have any o.o
Maybe =/
I feel like mine is usually just standard body language though... leaning forward and eye contact, smiling, etc.
sure, twirling hair
its all perfectly natural and subconcious
Yeah, but those guy things are like... actual sign language of sorts.
Hair touching (not even twirling) is an indication of 2 things:
1) Ascertaining whether we're still (hopefully) looking good
2) Drawing attention to face/neck/ears
huh, I just thought it meant they want to have sex with me
Not necessarily. Amend to 'kiss' and you'd be a bit closer.
sometimes Im not sure how seriously you take my comments
I pretty much never think you're serious when you say outrageous things.
the =| can be confusing
In a lot of cases, it's probably equivalent to "look over glasses, arch eyebrow slightly, are you serious (without a question mark)"
If I think you're serious but can't tell, I'll typically end up asking
might be more accurate
Yeah, I'm not doing that.
I think most of the time I acknowledge that it was a joke or an exaggeration by using the =| But I think I assume that part of whatever was said is believed in truth, so I clarify my point.
I'll have to ask my wife about that
time to eat again!
I wonder what it means when guys consistently joke about having a relationship already /ponder
generally it means they are not married
I find that most married men wouldnt joke about it if they were, but I could be wrong
It has to go deeper though... what sort of message are they trying to send? ^_^
ummm...that I joke?
You're making this much less entertaining and insightful than I was hoping it would be.
yeah well im eating
priorities
hot dog, cheddar cheese stick, sunflower seeds, granola bar, and almonds!
Where the hell do you get this food from?
just a hot dog, no bun, etc
my cousins kitchen
Well, that's good, I guess.
and the store
At least you aren't intentionally packing incredibly bizarre lunches. >.>
if I were packing my lunch, it would probably be stranger
hell, I had sesame seed butter on toast the other night
ohhh and Im gonna have some of my naked smoothie too =-)
Still haven't picked up more peanut butter?
nope
I have no idea what a naked smoothie is.
girl, I havent had time to go to the store
it's the brand name, its blueberry, blackberry, apple and banana
Ah.
k, back to work...
/cracks whip
ha HA!
I'm washing my sheets as we speak
I need to do that
sowie, I moved a 1/4 inch and lost my internet connection
Maybe you should run an ethernet cable
across the street?
O.o
hahah
Nevermind then.
what I do need is a wireless range extender
I don't foresee walking around much tomorrow btw
oh
Oh?
Did you break a toe?
No, I think I probably overdid it at the gym
geez, when was this?
Tonight
hmmmm, I see
well if you feel that way now just wait til you wake up tomorrow morning
Oh, I'm aware.
I feel fine right now, but I know how my legs felt when I was walking out of the gym.
so how long did you walk on the treadmill for?
1 set of reps on the leg press, 2 miles on treadmill
Had intended to do 2 more reps on the leg press, but was def. not up for it after getting off the treadmill
had to put the sheets in the dryer
That is usually preferable to putting them on the bed straight out of the washer.
so was there any stretching before any of this working out activity?
Minimal. It rarely seems to make a difference for me.
I'm not sure if that means I'm usually fairly stretched out.
O.o
it probably means you are doing it wrong
Your face is doing it wrong.
umhmm
I ran a mere 1 mile yesterday and today
mostly due to my late starts
Mmhm
so tomorrow I will get up earlier and go to the park, hopefully get 3 miles in
Good luck
I don't need luck
my goal is to do 5 miles a day, so about an hour workout
I need to find a track around my apt.
I can't jog/run on treadmills
My stride is too long
And I think I linger too long on each foot in a strange way, so it makes it weird
And I'm too clumsy to run on sidewalks. ^_^
I don't really like running on treadmills
There are a ton of parks around me. One is right by my place, I can walk there. Haven't been there in a while though
I have a feeling if I jogged on sideways/paths, I'd break my ankle(s)
whoa, you kinda woke me up with that
get your sheets out of the dryer and go to sleep
nah, almost time to eat again =)
oh em gee
mmhmm
You're insatiable.
I think I will have 1 piece of toast w/ ss butter and a sliver of birthday ice cream cake!
you don't even know how true that is :-|
What's the birthday cake from?
it's my roomies bday today
ah
24 y/o
I think he went to the glubs in philly
The what? O.o
O.o
what did I just say?

Andres: 24 y/o I think he went to the glubs in philly me: The what? O.o
Andres: O.o
What's up?
oh me gosh, this cake is delish!
So you frown at the cake?
That's got to be confusing.
no not at the cake, at the 3 square inches where I pick up internet
Ah
the toast was gross
Why?
turns out sesame seed butter is not that tasty
I feel like this movie was trying to highlight that men and women are fucked up in their own ways, but everyone's kind of got the same shit going on.
But it failed.
Because at the end, I still walk away thinking that guys are fucking assholes half the time when it comes to relationships.
I dont know what you are talking about
The one guy was a fucking asshole.
The other one was just kinda stupid.
yeah, and you're talking about...
Movie
Called Strictly Sexual =|
huh
perv
Probably less so than you.
oh and how's that?
You have a Y chromosome.
so you are stereotyping
So were you.
Well, I take that back
(watching 'Strictly Sexual')
You weren't stereotyping. You were just making summary judgements based on nothing.
no, based on the fact that you chose to watch a movie called 'strictly sexual'
Which you assume to be what genre?
I don't have to assume
Are you making the argument that you're omniscient?
I've heard of the movie, and Im watching it right now
Ah
and that
haha
I hate to say it, but that guy joe is HOT
Have a thing for tall blonds, eh?
we're not going to get into that
no
Hm.
Physique-wise, I prefer Stanny.
Facially & hair, Joe is the obvious winner.
I had not thought about it that much
I'm sure you've subconsciously analyzed the girls in the same fashion.
O.o
What?
well the redhead looks familiar
not sure where I know her from
She looks angry.
hah, Joe is an idiot
shoulda seen that coming
Yes.
Apparently the blond stereotype goes both ways gender-wise.
ooooh....you invent clothes!
hah
wait a minute, what is wrong with joes physique
I didn't say there was anything wrong with it.
so then why do you 'prefer' stanny's
Broader shoulders. Better biceps.
huh
typical
Oh?
it's all you women care about
I disagree.
One of my best friends prefers super lean guys.
oh, what's her name?
1) She's involved 2) She's in NC 3) You're too broad and muscular, though she is into Latinos.
me? too broad and muscular?
For her tastes.
what does she date, skeletons?
That would kind of describe Dorian, yeah. =/
Generally women prefer a beefier guy. I just happen to be naturally slender
Poor thing.
Im not complaining...and neither are the girls
lol
Well, at least not some of them.
right...just you relly
I'm pretty sure I have no evidenced any sort of negative opinion on the matter.
not*
/shrug
I'm not exactly petite.
Broader shoulders makes me feel smaller.
It's kind of a cool feeling.
I get it
Cuddling with all those hunky blond surfer guys. /nod
omg, this joe guy is awful
He's sweet.
yeah, but dumb as a rock
Reminds me of the last blond I dated.
ha
me too
hahah
Have you gotten to the sex scene(s) with Kristie Ann or w/e?
not sure, they are trying to pay the boys now
Okay, yeah. You're past the most awkward parts.
She's so good at acting bad.
I was feeling embarrassed on her behalf.
OMG, joe "wait a minute, what about that $1,000, that was pretty cool"
Gotta admit, that'd be a pretty sweet bonus.
gives me an idea....
I had a feeling you'd be inspired to allude something from that.
whats the dark-haired girls name?
Uh. Donna
yeah, shes nice
I mean like sweet nice
O.o
What scene are you watching?
when she pays joe
Oh wait
Sorry, that's Kristie Ann
Kristy Ann? Christie Ann? Anne?
w/e
Christi Ann, apparently
Donna's the red head
k
Not everyone wanted to.
Regardless of opportunity.
this movie is awful
Statement is prompted by?
the atrocity of the movie
I'm so glad you got more specific with that statement.
I mean the concept is just insane
Plausible
yeah ok
Well, parts of it
Donna is scary
How?
shes rough
How do you mean?
I dunno
Intimidated by the bondage?
she scares me, not my type
nah thats fine
I've dated women like her before
I end up feeling like shes the man and Im the woman
Why? Because she's opinionated and knows what she wants?
no, I mean thats ok. It's just the way she goes about it
Hm
Which scene prompted it?
all of em, but mainly at dinner
Really?
Because she had a problem with him calling all women morons?
NO
it's just they way she is
I can't really explain it
She
she's a control freak
No, I think she's just bitchy.
And thinks her opinions actually matter.
Wait, I want to rephrase that
Thinks that asserting her opinions will make a difference.
yeah, it's not a bad thing, shes just abrasive
I prefer women who are slightly less confrontational
You prefer being the abrasive one, I suppose.
O.o
I prefer to be in control
and I don't feel that I am that abrasive
In person, no.
as apposed to...
In text... some things could be read as abrasive.
they could
but it's all in fun
and you secretly like it
Oh, it's no secret. I like verbally sparring.
I don't want you to think that I llike sweet, innocent girls
If you did, you'd already have stopped talking to me, I think.
not that I dont 'like' them
I like people that are genuinely nice
but have some balls too
like joe
Oh dear
O.o
ahhhaha
hell I broke up with a girl because she was too nice
I avoided a relationship with my friend David.
He is, hands down, the nicest person I've ever met.
I was afraid I'd break him =/
its all about balance
Yeah
I turn sweet in relationships.
All the silly girly shit manifests for some reason
very odd
almost as if...you were a girl
I know, it's ridiculous.
it happens to me too, to a lesser extent
You start acting like a girl?
we'll say girl-like
lol
I think Im kind of jealous of the relationships of the friends
"The friends"?
yeah, stanny and joe
donna and k/a
Ah
I wouldnt mind being joe's wingman
You're probably nicer than Stanny
He's a dick.
he's very much a mans man
He's a dick.
Wait until the end.
I liked him fine until the party.
I miss hanging out with my girl friends.
We still keep in touch though.. long-distance friendship.
I just mean how tight they are
always there for each other
Yeah
I miss that kind of friendship
all my friends now are either far away, or have other things in their lives, like families...or both
Yep
Its depressing to be at my cousins sometimes
neither of them are happy
Why not?
because their lives are miserable
But why?
it would take to long to explain
they are trapped
all they do is work and take care of their kids
Offer to babysit? =/
I do sometimes
In some ways I am their bitch
That's nice of you
I can't imagine my life being like that
being like theirs
sometimes I am so relieved to get home and get away from it
they're broke
I haven't even gotten paid yet this month
Yeah, that's a tough situation.
I told them not to worry about it
I mean I will get paid, just not right now
aww, thats so sad. Christi ann didnt have the guts to tell joe how she felt
Why would she?
He'd already made his decision
He never indicated that he cared for her beyond the friendship they'd formed.
And she knew he would be better off financially going to model in Europe.
To her it felt like rejection before she had a chance.
sometimes you have to take a chance
besides, what did she have to lose?
In the long-run? Nothing worthwhile.
In the immediate moment? Dignity/pride.
And tactic rejections hurt quite a bit less than direct rejections.
but what if he really did leave, what if he was waiting for her to stop him?
and because of her stupid pride or fear, she let him walk away
She was trying to be selfless too. That's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity he had.
isn't that the greater risk?
Why didn't he say something to her about his feelings when he told her his plans?
it's about being honest
not thinking so much, and just doing what feels right
You seem to be supporting a double standard.
regardless of what may result from it
how so?
You're not presenting any opinion about how Joe should have reacted.
he wasn't confronted with it the way she was
Yes he was
it's not about it being the guy or the girl
He was just confronted with it from two different 3rd parties
its just the circumstance
It took the second 3rd party to straight out tell him he was being stupid.
That's pretty ridiculous.
you don't get to choose the circumstances
and that is really just an excuse to pass the responsibility to the other party
You typically get to choose how aware you are of your emotions.
"well, if joe cared for her, he would have told her and not gone to europe"
OF COURSE
Maybe.
that was not an answer to your comment
my of course refered to what joe should have done
Both sides def. should have stepped it up.
I understand why K/A held back though.
but he didnt. c/a was confronted with the situation of joe telling her that he was leaving
I do to, but she shouldnt have
I feel like she probably would have if he hadn't come up and announced to her that he was going
because it's not what she wanted to do
If he'd approached it more like "so... about that trip"
thats making it too easy
again, you don't get to choose the circumstance
How do you mean?
/rolleyes
This is digressing into a guy communication v. girl communication thing.
did you see the look on her face when he told her he was leaving?
(acting)
Yes.
that said it all
she was devastated
Yeah, and he was too stupid to see it.
gg.
joe = stupid
and she knew that
Most men would probably respond the same way.
As long as she wasn't crying or screaming, that means she's fine with it.
DONT STEREOTYPE!!!
I said most, not all.
I suppose it could be that guys would notice
They just don't act on it, preferring to ignore the signs and pretend everything's fine.
I'm not sure which I'd prefer.
he was too concerned with what stanny said
Well, then he's a fucking jackass.
joe = jackass
but stanny did come through in the end
For him
He was pretty shitty to Donna
yup

God forbid you have an actual conversation about the things that are bothering you instead of pretending like they don't exist until you can't pretend any more and then waging a full-fledged attack that takes advantage of every possible vulnerability you know of.
Speaking of, how do you respond in confrontations?
stanny and donna where dysfunctional
joe and c/a where simple
simple is easier
fuck
Yes, well, they were both simpler people.
1:24, don't exaggerate ^_^
closer to 1:30 than 1
I can't believe I watched that whole movie
It is, of course, your fault
but it does go to show, you always end up having feelings for people you sleep with
Hm
Not necessarily
If it was actually a one-night stand, there wouldn't be anything but fond memories.
It's when you start getting to know the people that you've slept with that you run into trouble.
'trouble'
I mean consistently
Yes
I'll agree to that
Though I don't have experience with trying to maintain a strictly sexual relationship
I don't do one night stands
what was we saying
You were telling me that you apparently don't do one-night stands.
oh right
If I like someone enough to sleep with them, then I like them enough to want to see them again
and I don't even kiss on a first date so sex is out of the question
ok
ok?
my internet is being particular
well, not 'my' internet
lol
but the sheets are done
I've got to go to bed
Yeah
Sleep is nice
k well get some
Aye, aye, captain!
Ill catch you tomorrow
er later today
yes lol
gnight
sleep well
